{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Cardistry {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Cardistry Cardistry is the performance art of card flourishing. Unlike card magic, cardistry is meant to be visually impressive and appear very hard to execute. The term "cardistry" is a portmanteau of "card" and "artistry". People who engage in cardistry are colloquially known as "cardists". Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cardistry)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
